explains: n. 亚麻布；家庭日用织品；<旧>内衣裤
adj. 亚麻的，亚麻布制的
wordGroup: table linen 餐布，餐桌用布
linen cloth 亚麻布；亚麻织物

sentences.en: From it he took a large, heavy linen bag and brought it to the child.
sentences.cn: 他从那里拿来一个又大又重的亚麻布口袋，递给孩子。

sentences.en: In the late 17th century, French refugees arrived here and developed the linen industry.
sentences.cn: 17世纪晚期，法国难民来到这里，发展了亚麻工业。
